title: The redesigned Office.com experience is now live for business users
content:
Microsoft’s redesigned Office.com experience – along with the Office app for Windows 10 and 11 – is now live for business and school users. Microsoft announced the new experience during its Ignite conference last November, but it’s fully available as of this week. The new Office.com page tries to make it easier to find the

The post The redesigned Office.com experience is now live for business users appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A redesigned Office.com experience is now available for business and education users, making it easier to get to your content.
